org.primaresearch.dla.page.io.xml

Interface XmlPageWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PageWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlPageWriter_2010_03_19, XmlPageWriter_2013_07_15

    public interface XmlPageWriter
extends PageWriter
    Interface for page writers producing XML.
    Author:
    clc

      • Methods inherited from interface org.primaresearch.dla.page.io.PageWriter

        validate, write

    • Method Detail

      • getSchemaVersion

        java.lang.String getSchemaVersion()
        Returns the XML schema version the writer supports (in format yyyy-mm-dd).

      • getSchemaLocation

        java.lang.String getSchemaLocation()
        Returns the location of the schema (e.g. http://schema.primaresearch.org/PAGE/gts/pagecontent/2010-03-19).

      • getSchemaUrl

        java.lang.String getSchemaUrl()
        Returns the URL of the schema file (e.g. http://schema.primaresearch.org/PAGE/gts/pagecontent/2010-03-19/pagecontent.xsd).

      • getNamespace

        java.lang.String getNamespace()
        Returns the name space. This is usually the same as the schema location.

      • getConversionInformation

        java.util.List<ConversionMessage> getConversionInformation()
        Returns format conversion related messages
